next_steps.note: "Brainstorm 5-10 potential themes or subjects for the poetry (e.g., nature, loss, love, urban life, introspection). Document these in the 'Ideas' section.",
"Write a first draft of one poem (approx. 10-20 lines) exploring one of the brainstormed themes. Add 'Draft 1 - [Poem Title]' to the 'Progress' section when complete.",
"Research 3-5 contemporary poets whose style resonates with the desired aesthetic for this project. Note key stylistic elements in the 'Ideas' section.",
"Define the intended tone or mood of the poetry collection (e.g., melancholic, hopeful, cynical, playful). Add this to the 'Ideas' section.",
"Establish a consistent writing schedule (e.g., 30 minutes per day, 2 poems per week) to ensure consistent progress. Record this commitment in the 'Ideas' section."
